Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: God is dead. God remains dead. And we have killed him. Yet his shadow still looms. How shall we comfort ourselves, the murderers of all murderers? What was holiest and mightiest of all that the world has yet owned has bled to death under our knives; who will wipe this blood off us? What water is there for us to clean ourselves?

Author: W. H. Auden
Quote: Thousands have lived without love, not one without water.

Author: Christopher Morley
Quote: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.

Author: Alan Watts
Quote: To have faith is to trust yourself to the water. When you swim you don't grab hold of the water, because if you do you will sink and drown. Instead you relax, and float.

Author: Dennis Rodman
Quote: This life is like a swimming pool. You dive into the water, but you can't see how deep it is.

Author: Lyndon B. Johnson
Quote: If one morning I walked on top of the water across the Potomac River, the headline that afternoon would read: 'President Can't Swim.'

Author: Dean Ornish
Quote: The need for connection and community is primal, as fundamental as the need for air, water, and food.

Author: John Lubbock
Quote: Rest is not idleness, and to lie sometimes on the grass under trees on a summer's day, listening to the murmur of the water, or watching the clouds float across the sky, is by no means a waste of time.

Author: Sophocles
Quote: The oaths of a woman I inscribe on water.

Author: Ray Charles
Quote: I was born with music inside me. Music was one of my parts. Like my ribs, my kidneys, my liver, my heart. Like my blood. It was a force already within me when I arrived on the scene. It was a necessity for me - like food or water.

Author: John W. Gardner
Quote: The society which scorns excellence in plumbing as a humble activity and tolerates shoddiness in philosophy because it is an exalted activity will have neither good plumbing nor good philosophy: neither its pipes nor its theories will hold water.

Author: John Burroughs
Quote: To find the universal elements enough; to find the air and the water exhilarating; to be refreshed by a morning walk or an evening saunter... to be thrilled by the stars at night; to be elated over a bird's nest or a wildflower in spring - these are some of the rewards of the simple life.

Author: John Ray
Quote: Good words cool more than cold water.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery
Quote: For true love is inexhaustible; the more you give, the more you have. And if you go to draw at the true fountainhead, the more water you draw, the more abundant is its flow.

Author: Wangari Maathai
Quote: Until you dig a hole, you plant a tree, you water it and make it survive, you haven't done a thing. You are just talking.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote: You don't drown by falling into water. You only drown if you stay there.

Author: Alok Sharma
Quote: Infrastructure is the backbone of economic growth. It improves access to basic services such as clean water and electricity, creates jobs and boosts business.

Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote: God has equipped you to handle difficult things. In fact, He has already planted the seeds of discipline and self-control inside you. You just have to water those seeds with His Word to make them grow!

Author: W. C. Fields
Quote: I never drink water; that is the stuff that rusts pipes.

Author: Kim Young-ha
Quote: Don't be a fish; be a frog. Swim in the water and jump when you hit ground.

Author: Rory McIlroy
Quote: On the course, I sometimes eat a little sandwich or a slow-release energy bar - one on the front nine and one on the back nine. You're out there five hours, so you have to keep eating. You're going to burn at least 1,000 calories. I'll try to take in about 400-600 calories during a round and drink water.

Author: Carl Hiaasen
Quote: My escape is to just get in a boat and disappear on the water.

Author: Muhammad Ali
Quote: Rivers, ponds, lakes and streams - they all have different names, but they all contain water. Just as religions do - they all contain truths.

Author: David Bowie
Quote: I'm an instant star. Just add water and stir.

Author: Thomas Carlyle
Quote: The work an unknown good man has done is like a vein of water flowing hidden underground, secretly making the ground green.

Author: Ivanka Trump
Quote: I pretty much only drink water, Tazo passion tea, or coffee with half and half, and it's an ongoing joke in the office that I never have less than three glasses of water and some form of tea or coffee in front of me.

Author: George Foreman
Quote: That's my gift. I let that negativity roll off me like water off a duck's back. If it's not positive, I didn't hear it. If you can overcome that, fights are easy.

Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote: The mind is like an iceberg, it floats with one-seventh of its bulk above water.

Author: Napoleon Bonaparte
Quote: Water, air, and cleanness are the chief articles in my pharmacy.

Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote: A woman is like a tea bag - you can't tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.

Author: Mitch Hedberg
Quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.

Author: Karen Blixen
Quote: The cure for anything is salt water: sweat, tears or the sea.

Author: Lao Tzu
Quote: Nothing is softer or more flexible than water, yet nothing can resist it.

Author: Leonardo da Vinci
Quote: Iron rusts from disuse; water loses its purity from stagnation... even so does inaction sap the vigor of the mind.

Author: Loren Eiseley
Quote: If there is magic on this planet, it is contained in water.

Author: Groucho Marx
Quote: Well, Art is Art, isn't it? Still, on the other hand, water is water. And east is east and west is west and if you take cranberries and stew them like applesauce they taste much more like prunes than rhubarb does. Now you tell me what you know.

Author: Tyler, The Creator
Quote: If the world was ending, I think I would grab some Cinnamon Toast Crunch, a bunch of water, and I'd probably just... I'd probably go crazy.

Author: Toni Morrison
Quote: All water has a perfect memory and is forever trying to get back to where it was.

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: Water is life, and clean water means health.

Author: Kobe Bryant
Quote: I'll do whatever it takes to win games, whether it's sitting on a bench waving a towel, handing a cup of water to a teammate, or hitting the game-winning shot.

Author: Stan Laurel
Quote: You can lead a horse to water, but a pencil must be lead.

Author: B. R. Ambedkar
Quote: Unlike a drop of water which loses its identity when it joins the ocean, man does not lose his being in the society in which he lives. Man's life is independent. He is born not for the development of the society alone, but for the development of his self.

Author: Carlos Castaneda
Quote: To achieve the mood of a warrior is not a simple matter. It is a revolution. To regard the lion and the water rats and our fellow men as equals is a magnificent act of a warrior's spirit. It takes power to do that.

Author: Fidel Castro
Quote: The Arab population of Palestine are victims of genocidal actions; their lands are confiscated or deprived of water supplies in the semi-desert areas, and their homes are destroyed with heavy wrecking equipment.

Author: Octavio Paz
Quote: The sound of water is worth more than all the poets' words.

Author: Rumi
Quote: Water, stories, the body, all the things we do, are mediums that hid and show what's hidden.

Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote: Marriage is like a game of chess except the board is flowing water, the pieces are made of smoke and no move you make will have any effect on the outcome.

Author: Sylvia Earle
Quote: No water, no life. No blue, no green.

Author: Nat Wolff
Quote: Jazz is smooth and cool. Jazz is rage. Jazz flows like water. Jazz never seems to begin or end. Jazz isn't methodical, but jazz isn't messy either. Jazz is a conversation, a give and take. Jazz is the connection and communication between musicians. Jazz is abandon.

Author: Mario Puzo
Quote: Friendship and money: oil and water.

Author: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi
Quote: Water is life's matter and matrix, mother and medium. There is no life without water.

Author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
Quote: Water and air, the two essential fluids on which all life depends, have become global garbage cans.

Author: DJ Khaled
Quote: You gotta water your plants. Nobody can water them for you.

Author: Alan Clark
Quote: There are no true friends in politics. We are all sharks circling, and waiting, for traces of blood to appear in the water.

Author: Christopher Hitchens
Quote: Owners of dogs will have noticed that, if you provide them with food and water and shelter and affection, they will think you are God. Whereas owners of cats are compelled to realize that, if you provide them with food and water and affection, they draw the conclusion that they are God.

Author: Joseph Stalin
Quote: A sincere diplomat is like dry water or wooden iron.

Author: Richard Quest
Quote: I couldn't sell water in a desert. I have no business acumen. I can tell you why you have no business acumen, and I can tell you why your project may or may not work, but I have no ability to make money.

Author: Dave Barry
Quote: The four building blocks of the universe are fire, water, gravel and vinyl.

Author: Diane Lane
Quote: All the lessons are in nature. You look at the way rocks are formed - the wind and the water hitting them, shaping them, making them what they are. Things take time, you know?

Author: Lucretius
Quote: The fall of dropping water wears away the Stone.

Author: John Muir
Quote: Take a course in good water and air; and in the eternal youth of Nature you may renew your own. Go quietly, alone; no harm will befall you.

Author: Kumail Nanjiani
Quote: Being a fish out of water is tough, but that's how you evolve.

Author: K. Flay
Quote: I've always had a duck personality. Calm above water, feet going crazy below.

Author: William Osler
Quote: Soap and water and common sense are the best disinfectants.

Author: Victor Webster
Quote: Everything we do, even the slightest thing we do, can have a ripple effect and repercussions that emanate. If you throw a pebble into the water on one side of the ocean, it can create a tidal wave on the other side.

Author: Thomas Fuller
Quote: Scalded cats fear even cold water.

Author: Raymond Carver
Quote: Life and death matters, yes. And the question of how to behave in this world, how to go in the face of everything. Time is short and the water is rising.

Author: Horace
Quote: No poems can please for long or live that are written by water drinkers.

Author: Saint Teresa of Avila
Quote: In a state of grace, the soul is like a well of limpid water, from which flow only streams of clearest crystal. Its works are pleasing both to God and man, rising from the River of Life, beside which it is rooted like a tree.

Author: Muhammad Iqbal
Quote: Destiny is the prison and chain of the ignorant. Understand that destiny like the water of the Nile: Water before the faithful, blood before the unbeliever.

Author: Chinua Achebe
Quote: People say that if you find water rising up to your ankle, that's the time to do something about it, not when it's around your neck.

Author: Sai Baba
Quote: You must be a lotus, unfolding its petals when the sun rises in the sky, unaffected by the slush where it is born or even the water which sustains it!

Author: Nikos Kazantzakis
Quote: Happiness is a simple everyday miracle, like water, and we are not aware of it.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: The finest workers in stone are not copper or steel tools, but the gentle touches of air and water working at their leisure with a liberal allowance of time.

Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote: As fire when thrown into water is cooled down and put out, so also a false accusation when brought against a man of the purest and holiest character, boils over and is at once dissipated, and vanishes and threats of heaven and sea, himself standing unmoved.

Author: Emily Bronte
Quote: I have dreamed in my life, dreams that have stayed with me ever after, and changed my ideas; they have gone through and through me, like wine through water, and altered the color of my mind.

Author: Peter Benchley
Quote: We provoke a shark every time we enter the water where sharks happen to be, for we forget: The ocean is not our territory - it's theirs.

Author: Kevin R. Stone
Quote: Drinking water is like washing out your insides. The water will cleanse the system, fill you up, decrease your caloric load and improve the function of all your tissues.

Author: Mark Twain
Quote: My books are like water; those of the great geniuses are wine. (Fortunately) everybody drinks water.

Author: Aeschylus
Quote: By polluting clear water with slime you will never find good drinking water.

Author: Josh Billings
Quote: Flattery is like cologne water, to be smelt, not swallowed.

Author: Maximillian Degenerez
Quote: Cross the meadow and the stream and listen as the peaceful water brings peace upon your soul.

Author: David Suzuki
Quote: If we pollute the air, water and soil that keep us alive and well, and destroy the biodiversity that allows natural systems to function, no amount of money will save us.

Author: Carl Wilson
Quote: Sure, we've had our fair share of ups and downs, but I don't know if we've had more than any other rock band... we just have a way of getting ourselves into hot water.

Author: Joe Kaeser
Quote: Sustainability is not just about adopting the latest energy-efficient technologies or turning to renewable sources of power. Sustainability is the responsibility of every individual every day. It is about changing our behaviour and mindset to reduce power and water consumption, thereby helping to control emissions and pollution levels.

Author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
Quote: Those who stand at the threshold of life always waiting for the right time to change are like the man who stands at the bank of a river waiting for the water to pass so he can cross on dry land.

Author: Sean Dyche
Quote: Anyone can take the wheel of the ship in calm water but it's not so easy when it's not calm water. You can't just enjoy the good times, you have to be resilient in the tough times.

Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote: When the well is dry, they know the worth of water.

Author: Clarissa Pinkola Estes
Quote: I hope you will go out and let stories happen to you, and that you will work them, water them with your blood and tears and you laughter till they bloom, till you yourself burst into bloom.

Author: Steven Wright
Quote: I bought some instant water one time but I didn't know what to add to it.

Author: Elon Musk
Quote: With artificial intelligence, we are summoning the demon. You know all those stories where there's the guy with the pentagram and the holy water, and he's like, yeah, he's sure he can control the demon? Doesn't work out.

Author: Stephen Curry
Quote: Drinking water is essential to a healthy lifestyle.

Author: Dan Quayle
Quote: It isn't pollution that's harming the environment. It's the impurities in our air and water that are doing it.

Author: Chris Rock
Quote: There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments.

Author: Nelson Mandela
Quote: Let there be work, bread, water and salt for all.

Author: Duke Kahanamoku
Quote: Out of the water, I am nothing.

Author: Victor Hugo
Quote: I met in the street a very poor young man who was in love. His hat was old, his coat worn, his cloak was out at the elbows, the water passed through his shoes, - and the stars through his soul.

Author: Rick Perry
Quote: The air we breathe, the water we drink, and the land we inhabit are not only critical elements in the quality of life we enjoy - they are a reflection of the majesty of our Creator.

Author: Pamela Hansford Johnson
Quote: The sky broke like an egg into full sunset and the water caught fire.

Author: Swami Sivananda
Quote: A mountain is composed of tiny grains of earth. The ocean is made up of tiny drops of water. Even so, life is but an endless series of little details, actions, speeches, and thoughts. And the consequences whether good or bad of even the least of them are far-reaching.

Author: Stewart Udall
Quote: Plans to protect air and water, wilderness and wildlife are in fact plans to protect man.

Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote: Water is the softest of all things, yet it is the most powerful. The ocean patiently allows all things to flow into it. It is always flexible. The Tao is not about grasping, but allowing, like water.

Author: M. Night Shyamalan
Quote: There's a monster outside my room, can I have a glass of water?

Author: Miguel de Cervantes
Quote: Truth will rise above falsehood as oil above water.

Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Quote: Where there's water on Earth, you find life as we know it. So if you find water somewhere else, it becomes a remarkable draw to look closer to see if life of any kind is there, even if it's bacterial, which would be extraordinary for the field of biology.

Author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
Quote: I drive a hybrid, moving into an electric car. I only drink tap water, never consume food that's travelled.

Author: Klaus Schwab
Quote: The First Industrial Revolution used water and steam power to mechanize production. The Second used electric power to create mass production. The Third used electronics and information technology to automate production.

Author: Aesop
Quote: It is with our passions as it is with fire and water, they are good servants, but bad masters.

Author: Erin Brockovich
Quote: Awareness is key. In the absence of information, none of us know what is happening and what could be jeopardizing our health, our water supply, and our planet.

Author: Martin Luther King III
Quote: Because no matter who we are or where we come from, we're all entitled to the basic human rights of clean air to breathe, clean water to drink, and healthy land to call home.

Author: Jonathan Raban
Quote: In an underdeveloped country don't drink the water. In a developed country don't breathe the air.

Author: John C. Reilly
Quote: There's something about the water - that solitary kind of peaceful feeling. You're on Earth but not quite.

Author: Lucy Larcom
Quote: A drop of water, if it could write out its own history, would explain the universe to us.

Author: Ellen Swallow Richards
Quote: If you keep your feathers well oiled the water of criticism will run off as from a duck's back.

Author: Ban Ki-moon
Quote: Saving our planet, lifting people out of poverty, advancing economic growth... these are one and the same fight. We must connect the dots between climate change, water scarcity, energy shortages, global health, food security and women's empowerment. Solutions to one problem must be solutions for all.

Author: James Taylor
Quote: Being on a boat that's moving through the water, it's so clear. Everything falls into place in terms of what's important and what's not.

Author: Travis Kalanick
Quote: We want transportation as reliable as running water.

Author: Henri Frederic Amiel
Quote: It is by teaching that we teach ourselves, by relating that we observe, by affirming that we examine, by showing that we look, by writing that we think, by pumping that we draw water into the well.

Author: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf
Quote: The future belongs to us, because we have taken charge of it. We have the commitment, we have the resourcefulness, and we have the strength of our people to share the dream across Africa of clean water for all.

Author: John Niven
Quote: If you put a frog in boiling water, it'll jump straight out. If you put it in cold water and gradually bring it to the boil, it'll sit right there until it dies. Scotland has been sitting in England's gradually boiling water for so long that many people are used to it.

Author: Michael Phelps
Quote: I feel most at home in the water. I disappear. That's where I belong.

Author: Cedric Richmond
Quote: Imagine if, in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina, Gulf Coast residents had to wait on Democrats and Republicans to agree on cuts before receiving clean water or loans to rebuild. Congress' negotiations often come slow or not at all.

Author: William Blake
Quote: The man who never alters his opinions is like standing water, and breeds reptiles of the mind.

Author: Rithy Panh
Quote: Clay is a very interesting and fundamental material: it's earth, it's water, and - with fire - it takes on form and life.

Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote: There are moments in life, when the heart is so full of emotion That if by chance it be shaken, or into its depths like a pebble Drops some careless word, it overflows, and its secret, Spilt on the ground like water, can never be gathered together.

Author: Mikhail Gorbachev
Quote: A society should never become like a pond with stagnant water, without movement. That's the most important thing.

Author: Robin Williams
Quote: You'll notice that Nancy Reagan never drinks water when Ronnie speaks.

Author: Tae Yoo
Quote: After a natural disaster, safe drinking water is a priority. Humans can live longer without food than water, so communication about clean water is essential to help avoid the risk of cholera, dysentery, malnutrition, famine, and death.

Author: John Keats
Quote: I am in that temper that if I were under water I would scarcely kick to come to the top.

Author: Donovan
Quote: A writer without a pen would be like a duck without water!

Author: Hernan Cortes
Quote: An abundant supply of excellent water, forming a volume equal in bulk to the human body, is conveyed by one of these pipes, and distributed about the city, where it is used by the inhabitants for drink and other purposes.

Author: Ivan Pavlov
Quote: It has long been known for sure that the sight of tasty food makes a hungry man's mouth water; also lack of appetite has always been regarded as an undesirable phenomenon, from which one might conclude that appetite is essentially linked with the process of digestion.

Author: Michael Faraday
Quote: Water is to me, I confess, a phenomenon which continually awakens new feelings of wonder as often as I view it.

Author: Yahya Jammeh
Quote: When your neighbour's house is on fire, you should help with a bucket of water.

Author: Jessica Mendoza
Quote: As a mom, spending quality time on the water with my family is a simple and relaxing way to unplug.

Author: Nikola Jokic
Quote: I loved playing every sport. Soccer, water polo, horses. Whatever. I just loved it - especially competing against my brothers.

Author: Napoleon Hill
Quote: If you must speak ill of another, do not speak it, write it in the sand near the water's edge.

Author: Douglas Fairbanks
Quote: Real laughter is spontaneous. Like water from the spring it bubbles forth a creation of mingled action and spontaneity - two magic potions in themselves - the very essence of laughter - the unrestrained emotion within us!

Author: Indra Devi
Quote: Like water which can clearly mirror the sky and the trees only so long as its surface is undisturbed, the mind can only reflect the true image of the Self when it is tranquil and wholly relaxed.

Author: Rihanna
Quote: I drink a lot of coconut water. It balances out all the other toxic stuff I put into my body.

Author: Ovid
Quote: Thou seest how sloth wastes the sluggish body, as water is corrupted unless it moves.

Author: Tove Jansson
Quote: Lie on the bridge and watch the water flowing past. Or run, or wade through the swamp in your red boots. Or roll yourself up and listen to the rain falling on the roof. It's very easy to enjoy yourself.

Author: Zhou Qunfei
Quote: Droplets of water would roll around the surface of a lotus leaf and not leave any trace.

Author: Colin Powell
Quote: Indeed, we're strongest when the face of America isn't only a soldier carrying a gun but also a diplomat negotiating peace, a Peace Corps volunteer bringing clean water to a village, or a relief worker stepping off a cargo plane as floodwaters rise.

Author: Hugh Ross
Quote: An adult human can last 40 days without food, a week without any sleep, three days without water, but only five minutes without air. Yet nothing is more taken for granted than the air we breathe. However, not just any air will do - it must be exquisitely designed to meet our needs. Too little oxygen in the atmosphere will kill us, as will too much.

Author: Rza
Quote: When you prepare for something, it's like jumping into cold water, but you're prepared. You jump in. And you start swimming, or if you don't swim, you drown.

Author: W. C. Fields
Quote: Reminds me of my safari in Africa. Somebody forgot the corkscrew and for several days we had to live on nothing but food and water.

Author: Alain de Botton
Quote: The Arab-Israeli conflict is also in many ways a conflict about status: it's a war between two peoples who feel deeply humiliated by the other, who want the other to respect them. Battles over status can be even more intractable than those over land or water or oil.

Author: Morihei Ueshiba
Quote: Study how water flows in a valley stream, smoothly and freely between the rocks. Also learn from holy books and wise people. Everything - even mountains, rivers, plants and trees - should be your teacher.

Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote: If a writer knows enough about what he is writing about, he may omit things that he knows. The dignity of movement of an iceberg is due to only one ninth of it being above water.

Author: Isabeli Fontana
Quote: If you take the right vitamins and drink enough water, your body flushes everything out for you.

Author: Adriana Lima
Quote: Coconut water is just the best for you; it's always something we had in Brazil. Since I was a little girl, I've been drinking it.

Author: Siouxsie Sioux
Quote: My dreams are of water. And my nightmares.

Author: Sam Kinison
Quote: Jesus is still up in Heaven, thumbing through his Bible, going 'Where did I say build a water slide?'

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: Would that I were a dry well, and that the people tossed stones into me, for that would be easier than to be a spring of flowing water that the thirsty pass by, and from which they avoid drinking.

Author: Khabib Nurmagomedov
Quote: Give me 30 minutes rest, little drink of water. Give me 30 minutes, and I can fight with anybody.

Author: Sunita Williams
Quote: We really have the most beautiful planet in our solar system. None other can sustain life like we know it. None other has blue water and white clouds covering colorful landmasses filled with thriving, beautiful, living things like human beings.

Author: Lou Holtz
Quote: I don't drink water, haven't drank water in 40 years.

Author: Jhene Aiko
Quote: Yeah, I mean I'm a water sign. I'm a Pisces.

Author: Alvar N. C. de Vaca
Quote: Seeing that our thirst was increasing and the water was killing us, while the storm did not abate, we agreed to trust to God, Our Lord, and rather risk the perils of the sea than wait there for certain death from thirst.

Author: Borns
Quote: You should always read the ingredients in coconut water. It should say 100% coconut water.

Author: Michael Burry
Quote: Fresh, clean water cannot be taken for granted. And it is not - water is political, and litigious. Transporting water is impractical for both political and physical reasons, so buying up water rights did not make a lot of sense to me, unless I was pursuing a greater fool theory of investment - which was not my intention.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Quote: All good writing is swimming under water and holding your breath.

Author: Eugenie Clark
Quote: People come to me and say, 'What'll I do if I go in the water and see a shark?' You don't have to do anything. The chances of that shark attacking you in any way is so remote. The sea should be enjoyed, the animals in it. When you see a shark underwater, you should say, 'How lucky I am to see this beautiful animal in his environment!'

Author: Roy Cooper
Quote: Everyone deserves to have confidence in their drinking water.

Author: Diane Greene
Quote: To sail successfully, you need to observe with great care. You need to identify what the wind and the water are telling you and then find a way to execute, to reach whatever goal you've set, be that simply making it home or winning a race.

Author: Alice Oswald
Quote: It's a relief to hear the rain. It's the sound of billions of drops, all equal, all equally committed to falling, like a sudden outbreak of democracy. Water, when it hits the ground, instantly becomes a puddle or rivulet or flood.

Author: William Lyon Phelps
Quote: A cat pours his body on the floor like water. It is restful just to see him.

Author: Ryan Reynolds
Quote: I love Canada. It makes a nice hat for America. When America runs out of water, it's the first place I'll go.

Author: Guillermo del Toro
Quote: I think love is the greatest force in the universe. It's shapeless like water. It only takes the shape of things it becomes.

Author: Jack Welch
Quote: My main job was developing talent. I was a gardener providing water and other nourishment to our top 750 people. Of course, I had to pull out some weeds, too.

Author: Bjarke Ingels
Quote: St. Petersburg is a wonderful city. You have wonderful parks, birds singing in the trees, manatees in the water, pelicans. So it's like this little paradise on Earth.

Author: Sofia Boutella
Quote: Sleeping and water are lifesavers - that's true beauty right there.

Author: Daniel Lubetzky
Quote: Failure holds the seeds for greatness - so long as you water those seeds with introspection, they can be the root of your success.

Author: James Buchan
Quote: A century ago, petroleum - what we call oil - was just an obscure commodity; today it is almost as vital to human existence as water.

Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote: It doesn't matter if the water is cold or warm if you're going to have to wade through it anyway.

Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quote: The artist produces for the liberation of his soul. It is his nature to create as it is the nature of water to run down the hill.

Author: Daniel D. Palmer
Quote: The mill cannot grind with the water that is past.

Author: Matthew McConaughey
Quote: Water's never clumsy.

Author: Constantin Brancusi
Quote: When you see a fish you don't think of its scales, do you? You think of its speed, its floating, flashing body seen through the water... If I made fins and eyes and scales, I would arrest its movement, give a pattern or shape of reality. I want just the flash of its spirit.

Author: Leonardo da Vinci
Quote: In rivers, the water that you touch is the last of what has passed and the first of that which comes; so with present time.

Author: Shakira
Quote: It doesn't bother me to talk about my private life, it doesn't bother me to talk about anything. My life is like a glass of water, transparent.

Author: Bill Nye
Quote: There is good evidence that Venus once had liquid water and a much thinner atmosphere, similar to Earth billions of years ago. But today the surface of Venus is dry as a bone, hot enough to melt lead, there are clouds of sulfuric acid that reach a hundred miles high and the air is so thick it's like being 900 meters deep in the ocean.

Author: Unknown
Quote: I never drink water because of the disgusting things that fish do in it.

Author: Tom Robbins
Quote: Our world isn't made of earth, air and water or even molecules and atoms; our world is made of language.

Author: Cole Hauser
Quote: I definitely don't generalize and put everybody in the same cup of water.

Author: Philippe Petit
Quote: I have a fear of water, believe it or not. To put a wire 12 feet over a swimming pool frightens me. I don't like water.

Author: Nikola Tesla
Quote: The universal utilization of water power and its long-distance transmission will supply every household with cheap power and will dispense with the necessity of burning fuel. The struggle for existence being lessened, there should be development along ideal rather than material lines.

Author: Kris Carr

Quote: My family has spent 400 years farming on the banks of the Rio Grande. We know the value of hard work, love of the community, love for water and land.

Author: Kat Dennings
Quote: Anything can happen when under the influence of ice water.

Author: Shallan Davar
Quote: I thought I saw something in the water, just now. A pattern of sharp lines, like a maze.
